author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: POTD: Emmerdale's Andy reveals his troubled past to Pete - Emmerdale Soaps
text: Emmerdale's Andy Sugden offers Pete Barton a ray of hope tonight (October 12) by opening up over his past.Andy (Kelvin Fletcher) becomes concerned for Pete when he sees how much his fellow farmer is struggling with his family's anger over what he did to Ross.Revealing that he can relate to what Pete (Anthony Quinlan) is going through, Andy recalls how he once nearly killed his father Jack by accidentally shooting him.Pete feels reassured to hear that Andy was eventually forgiven by his loved ones, but peacemaker Andy later goes a step further by urging James to cut Pete some slack. Will things look up for Pete?
